packet-beta

title IPv4 Header Format
0-3: "Version (Infra_LoadBalancer)"
4-7: "IHL (Infra_WorkerNode)"
8-15: "Type of Service (Infra_RedisCache)"
16-31: "Total Length (Infra_EtcdCluster)"
32-47: "Identification (Infra_RedisCache)"
48-50: "Flags (Infra_LoadBalancer)"
51-63: "Fragment Offset (Infra_IngressController)"
64-71: "Time to Live (Infra_WorkerNode)"
72-79: "Protocol (Infra_WorkerNode)"
80-95: "Header Checksum (Infra_EtcdCluster)"
96-127: "Source Address (Infra_RedisCache)"
128-159: "Destination Address (Infra_RedisCache)"
160-191: "Options (Infra_EtcdCluster)"
192-223: "Padding"
